transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji Gupta ji Nidhi baat kar rahi hu India Mart se.
Executive: Haan ji madam.
Customer: Hue sir aap free?
Executive: Haan ji madam bataiye.
Customer: Haan ji sir actually aapka concern tha sir ki aapko buyer ki jo calls hai wo receive nahi ho rahi thi.
Executive: To kal Mansi ne discuss kiya tha sir mere se to humne jo hamari technical department hai unko ye concern dala tha.
Executive: To hame pata chala ki aapki side se jo aapki foreign only ka option hota hai na wo enable tha jiski vajah se aapko domestic calls nahi aa rahi thi sir.
Executive: To wo abhi aapke side se hame correct karana tha. I hope so jo aapke account manager hai unse aapki baat hui hogi jo aapke yaha pe ek lady kam karti hai na.
Customer: Koi problem nahi.
Executive: Unse hamara discussion hua tha. To ye aapne enable kar diya sir?
Customer: Nahi wo disable karna hai na madam wo international disable yes yes international call ko disable karna hai sir.
Customer: Haan to madam abhi shukrawar idea lag gaya hai wo disable ho jayega madam.
Executive: Wo disable ho jayega sir iske alava aap please bataiye sir aur koi concern hai aapka?
Customer: Concern madam ye hai ki mera ek request rahega ki please hamara account manager ko ab zara change kar do.
Customer: Thoda sa.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Sir uska koi reason hai?
Customer: Definitely reason hai madam.
Executive: Ji bataiye sir please.
Customer: Mere yahan se kal ek inquiry gayi unko ki sahab hamare yahan ye calls nahi aa rahi.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Abhi wo naya jo apne kam karne staff hai apne to unse unka discussion ho raha tha to unhone mujhe line pe connect kiya unko kuch clear nahi ho rahi thi.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: To unhone mujhe line pe connect kiya connect kiya to Mansi ji humko samjhane lagi aapka profile mein ye cheeze nahi hoti hai to calls nahi aati ye cheeze nahi hoti hai to calls nahi aati call drop hoti hai is vajah se calls nahi aati miss call ho jati hai to aur is tarah se maine kaha madam kya aapne mera profile check kiya?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Keh rahi hai sir main usi check karke utare ho maine kaha aap general baat bata rahi hai ya ki ye cause ho sakte hai isliye call nahi aa rahi hai ya aapne mera profile open kiya hua hai keh rahi hai maine aapka profile open kiya hua hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Sir madam mujhe itna gussa aaya ki ye ye ladki kam kar rahi hai mazak kar rahi hai ye.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Aap samjho ki agar wo keh rahi hai 10 se 15 call drop hai aapke har mahine.
Customer: Maine kaha madam mera profile fir aapne open hi nahi kar rakha hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Aap check kijiyega kisi mahina panch aath call se upar mera drop nahi hai pichle panch saal ka record aap check kar lo ek saal ek mahine che mahine ki baat nahi kar raha hu aap maine unko call pe rehte rehte unhone open kiya kisi mahine mein panch call drop miss hai kisi mein do hai kisi mein aath hai wo aise karke cheez nikal gayi ye cheez khatam ho gayi ab aate hai second pe keh rahi hai sir to aapka na jo profile hai wo top 10 mein nahi hoga.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Maine kaha madam fir aapko India Mart ka process hi pata nahi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Ye aapka top 10 mein hone na hone se is baat ka koi fark nahi padta call jo hai wo jo profile hai rotate hai lekin koi baat nahi fir bhi agar aap mera check kar sakte hai agar top 10 mein nahi hai fir mujhe aaj mera catalog wapas kara do fir mujhe India Mart ke sath kam hi nahi karna aap mera catalog utha ke dekho meri photos dekho meri company ka profile dekho ranking dekho reviews dekho top 10 mein inke to fir band kar do aap mera second.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: To please madam main aise aise staff ke sath kam matlab aise kisi bande ke sath kam nahi kar sakta ki mera staff call kare aur usko misguide ya mistreating kare.
Customer: To I request you ki agar aap aapke power mein hai to mera account manager aap change kar do.
Executive: Haan bilkul sir hum change kar dete hai koi problem nahi hai sir.
Customer: Aap mera account manager immediately change kar dete hai aur ye aaj ki baat nahi madam mera unse teen mahine pehle discussion hua kisi.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Tabhi wo clear nahi thi wo aapko abhi mujhe aisa lagta hai shayad ye to nahi abhi shayad unko training ki aur jarurat hai aur kal main kyuki international call ka to pata hi nahi tha theek hai nahi unko bhi nahi pata tha hame bhi hame to idea hi nahi ye international call actually pehle ek bacha rakha hai to usne shayad isko open kar diya hoga ya unka kare to is hisab se dedh mahine se call nahi aa rahi hai ab koi cheez nahi aa rahi madam dedh mahine se kya unhone do mahine se dedh mahine se ek bar bhi call back kiya ya yaar is profile pe ye nahi ho raha hai aisa kyun nahi ho raha hai ye activity kyun nahi ho rahi hai.
Customer: Bas jis samay renewal aayega us samay to roz yaad aayegi aap logo ko uske pehle aapko koi matlab nahi hai.
Customer: To madam aapne mujhse concern pucha mujhe pata nahi aapko kitna genuine laga concern lekin madam meri pakad se bahar hai unka profile open karke profile open karke batati ki ha sir yaha pe ye cheez dikh rahi hai ye cheez nahi dikh rahi hai aur main bol raha hu ki chahe kitna bhi kisi ki profile pe kam na ho raha ho agar wo trust leke baitha hai to mahine mein ek call to aayega na mere hal mein ye bhi common sense nahi laga rahi hai main unko bol raha hu madam ek call to kam se kam aata mere pass october mein mere pass ek single call nahi hai november mein che din beet gaye ek single call mere pass nahi hai wo common sense hi nahi laga rahi hai maine kaha bhai koi fayda nahi hai kal mujhe gussa aa gaya madam.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Maine kaha yaar tumko idea hai nahi tum rakho yaar isko.
Executive: Nahi sir uske liye main sorry bolti hu aapko aage se aapko aisi problem nahi aayegi aur main aapka immediate basis pe aapka account manager change kar deti hu sir.
Customer: Thank you madam thank you.
Executive: For the future sir main ek kam karti hu main aapko mera number share kar deti hu whatsapp pe senior manager here sir aap mujhe koi bhi concern hota hai mujhe connect kar sakte ho.
Customer: Theek hai thank you madam.
Executive: Theek hai although to main aapko ek new account manager assign kara deti hu main shweta karke meri team mein ek ladki hai unko aapka account transfer kar deti hu aur in future aapko kuch bhi problem hoti hai to main mera number aapko direct whatsapp pe share kar deti hu aap mera number save kar lijiyega sir koi bhi problem hoti hai aap direct mujhe call kar lijiyega.
Customer: Okay thank you madam.
Executive: Theek hai sir abhi aap bataiye with your permission sir kya main aapka jo concern hai usko close kar du?
Customer: Yeah definitely close kar dijiye.
Executive: Thank you sir aapke aapke pass mere liye feedback jayega sir aapka jo bhi concern tha maine aapko help kiya ya nahi kiya aapka concern close karne mein aap apne according feedback de sakte ho sir.
Customer: Okay ji thank you.
Executive: Thank you so much sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving buyer calls.

- Account manager is not helpful.

- Account manager lacks product knowledge.



Resolution:

- Executive assured immediate account manager change.

- Executive shared personal number for future concerns.

- New account manager will be assigned.



Next Steps: 

- Account manager will be changed immediately.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account manager, profile, support
